Package org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity

Class MeanAbsoluteError

java.lang.Object
org.tribuo.regression.rtree.impurity.MeanAbsoluteError
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.config.Configurable, com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.Provenancable<com.oracle.labs.mlrg.olcut.provenance.ConfiguredObjectProvenance>, RegressorImpurity
public class MeanAbsoluteError extends Object implements RegressorImpurity
Measures the mean absolute error over a set of inputs.

Used to calculate the impurity of a regression node.
